Job Role:

  • Customer Service Executive for Medical & Insurance Sales process

Job Location:

  • Office-based (Palegaon, Ambernath)

About the Role:

Join our high-energy sales team as a Telecaller specializing in medical and insurance products. This role is ideal for driven individuals passionate about hardcore sales, converting leads, and maximizing revenue through persuasive communication. Uncapped incentives offer exceptional earning potential based on performance.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Conduct outbound sales calls for medical/insurance products to potential clients.
  • Explain product benefits, handle objections, and close sales.
  • Maintain accurate records of interactions in Google sheets.
  • Follow compliance guidelines for insurance/medical sales.
  • Collaborate with the sales team to refine pitch strategies.

Requirements:

  • Proficiency in English, Hindi, and Marathi (spoken/written)
  • Proven experience in sales/cold-calling (medical/insurance preferred)
  • Strong negotiation and closing skills
  • Reliable smartphone with stable internet (for onboarding/training)

Salary & Other Benefits:

  • Up to 7000/month
  • Incentives: Unlimited earnings
  • Structured performance reviews for rapid incentive growth
  • Sales training and skill development

Rounds of Interview:

  • 1st round will be virtual & Final round will be face to face.
